resources.string: The glass may not be half empty, but this form sure is. Fill out at least one field
Login or sign up and we\'ll sync all the drinks you have taken note of.

You haven\'t been active on Brew yet. Have a look around, drink something nice, and your activity will turn up here
We\'ll keep your drinks handy while you\'re gone
It looks like you\'re not logged in. This will permanently delete your drinks
We\'ll keep your drinks safe in the cloud

Throughout the development of Brew we\'ve been lucky enough to have contributions from a number of people in different areas. These contributions are greatly appreciated, as without them Brew would not be what it is today. Here\'s everyone

The design found in the Brew app is a key part of what makes Brew feel the way it does. A number of icons have been sources from The Noun Project. The makers of these icons may not be aware they contributed to Brew, but should be recognised anyway
Brew needed to be build, and being an open source project garners contributions from anyone who\'s interested. Here\'s to them
Brew wouldn\'t be anywhere near usable without testers. They\'ve helped to find bugs before they\'re released, and help to keep the experience of using Brew as smooth as possible
How we sync your drink data is entirely up to you. You can choose exactly how much information you want to sync, and how often we do it
These settings allow you to choose what information is saved to the cloud
These settings allow you to choose when we sync your information
Sync as soon as you log a drink
